title: Creamy butternut squash soup
ingredients: ['1 butternut squash, about 780g, peeled, seeded and cut into chunks', '1 large carrot, peeled and thickly sliced', '1 red pepper, seeded and chopped', '1 large onion, thinly sliced', '3 garlic cloves, crushed', '80g full-fat soft cheese', '1 tbsp finely snipped fresh chives', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', '2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley', 'To serve', '40g blue cheese (such as Roquefort, Stilton or Danish blue), crumbled', 'sprigs of flat-leaf parsley to garnish']
